hf.name: Marcus
hf.appearance: Tall with glasses and a scruffy beard
hf.clothing: Casual jeans and a graphic tee

json_to_edit.voice_over: Be careful what you wish for, they say. I never truly understood until that day.
json_to_edit.description: Emily and Marcus visit an ancient wishing well, unaware of its true power.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant chatter, birds chirping, coins clinking
json_to_edit.name: The Wishing Well
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily makes a wish at an ancient well, leading to unexpected consequences.

qa.action: Pan across the quaint old town square, focusing on the ancient wishing well.

hf.action: Emily and Marcus approach the well, Emily excited and Marcus hesitant.

tr.action: Emily tosses a coin into the well, her eyes closed in concentration.

xc.action: The coin hits the water, creating a small splash and an unusual shimmer.

ka.action: Emily and Marcus step back as the ground begins to tremble slightly.

fn.action: A sudden gust of wind sweeps through the square, scattering leaves.

af.action: Emily's eyes widen in a mix of excitement and fear as she realizes something's changed.

qo.action: Emily and Marcus exchange worried glances, sensing the shift in atmosphere.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, but don't change anything else. The new shots should provide additional context or detail to the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: Be careful what you wish for, they say. I never truly understood until that day.
updated_json.description: Emily and Marcus visit an ancient wishing well, unaware of its true power.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant chatter, birds chirping, coins clinking
updated_json.name: The Wishing Well
updated_json.scene_summary: Emily makes a wish at an ancient well, leading to unexpected consequences.

zx.action: A bird's eye view of the old town, slowly zooming in on the square with the ancient well.

qa.action: Pan across the quaint old town square, focusing on the ancient wishing well.

yw.action: Emily and Marcus walking through the town, Emily pointing excitedly at various sights.

hf.action: Emily and Marcus approach the well, Emily excited and Marcus hesitant.

lm.action: Emily's hand, holding a coin, her fingers tracing the ancient engravings on the well's edge.

tr.action: Emily tosses a coin into the well, her eyes closed in concentration.

np.action: Looking down into the well as the coin descends, the water's surface reflecting the sky.

xc.action: The coin hits the water, creating a small splash and an unusual shimmer.

bv.action: The well's structure seems to shift slightly, unnoticed by Emily and Marcus.

ka.action: Emily and Marcus step back as the ground begins to tremble slightly.

cm.action: Leaves on a nearby tree start to quiver, hinting at the approaching gust.

fn.action: A sudden gust of wind sweeps through the square, scattering leaves.

dk.action: Emily's dress and hair flutter in the wind, her expression changing from joy to confusion.

af.action: Emily's eyes widen in a mix of excitement and fear as she realizes something's changed.

ej.action: From Marcus's perspective, we see Emily's face and the square behind her, where people are starting to notice the strange occurrences.

qo.action: Emily and Marcus exchange worried glances, sensing the shift in atmosphere.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot to provide additional context or detail to the scene. this will double the number of shots from 8 to 16. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots, and add new shot descriptions that complement and enhance the existing ones. the new shots will be creative and add depth to the scene without changing the overall narrative or existing shots.
